DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : nonsmoking status smoker ( 1 pack per day ) age : 1835 stable body weight , range 80 % 130 % , maintenance normal exercise activity pattern total cholesterol ≤ 7.758 mmol/L ( 300 mg/dl ) triglyceride concentration ≤ 3.387 mmol/L ( 300 mg/dl ) Subjects exclude fulfill one following : antioxidant supplement user rest blood pressure 160/105 mm Hg engage aerobic activity five hour per week vegetarian restrictive dietary requirement fast blood glucose concentration ≥ 7.77 mmol/L ( 140 mg/dl ) history diabetes uremia know metabolic disease medication use know affect lipid metabolism
